concept.title: Upgrade an Installation with Cloudera Manager
concept.shortdesc: When you upgrade an installation with Cloudera Manager, the new version uses the same directories to store configuration, data, log, and resource files. As a result, the new version has access to the pipeline, log, and resource files created in the previous version.

conbody.p:
Cloudera Managerupgrading Data Collectorupgradethrough Cloudera ManagerTo upgrade through Cloudera Manager, perform the following steps:
Install the new StreamSets custom service descriptor (CSD).
(Optional.) Manually install the parcel and checksum files. Typically only needed when the Cloudera Manager Server does not have internet access.
Download, distribute, and activate the new StreamSets parcel.
conbody.note: You must perform the steps in this order, or will fail to start.
